002// Open Source Software; you can modify and/or share it under the terms of

004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.smartdashboard;
006
007import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose2d;
008import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Rotation2d;
009import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Translation2d;
010import edu.wpi.first.math.trajectory.Trajectory;
011import edu.wpi.first.networktables.DoubleArrayEntry;
012import java.util.ArrayList;
013import java.util.List;
014
015/** Game field object on a Field2d. */
016public class FieldObject2d implements AutoCloseable {
017  /**
018   * Package-local constructor.
019   *
020   * @param name name
021   */
022  FieldObject2d(String name) {
023    m_name = name;
024  }
025
026  @Override
027  public void close() {
028    m_entry.close();
029  }
030
031  /**
032   * Set the pose from a Pose object.
033   *
034   * @param pose 2D pose
035   */
036  public synchronized void setPose(Pose2d pose) {
037    setPoses(pose);
038  }
039
040  /**
041   * Set the pose from x, y, and rotation.
042   *
043   * @param xMeters X location, in meters
044   * @param yMeters Y location, in meters
045   * @param rotation rotation
046   */
047  public synchronized void setPose(double xMeters, double yMeters, Rotation2d rotation) {
048    setPose(new Pose2d(xMeters, yMeters, rotation));
049  }
050
051  /**
052   * Get the pose.
053   *
054   * @return 2D pose
055   */
056  public synchronized Pose2d getPose() {
057    updateFromEntry();
058    if (m_poses.isEmpty()) {
059      return new Pose2d();
060    }
061    return m_poses.get(0);
062  }
063
064  /**
065   * Set multiple poses from an list of Pose objects. The total number of poses is limited to 85.
066   *
067   * @param poses list of 2D poses
068   */
069  public synchronized void setPoses(List<Pose2d> poses) {
070    m_poses.clear();
071    for (Pose2d pose : poses) {
072      m_poses.add(pose);
073    }
074    updateEntry();
075  }
076
077  /**
078   * Set multiple poses from an list of Pose objects. The total number of poses is limited to 85.
079   *
080   * @param poses list of 2D poses
081   */
082  public synchronized void setPoses(Pose2d... poses) {
083    m_poses.clear();
084    for (Pose2d pose : poses) {
085      m_poses.add(pose);
086    }
087    updateEntry();
088  }
089
090  /**
091   * Sets poses from a trajectory.
092   *
093   * @param trajectory The trajectory from which the poses should be added.
094   */
095  public synchronized void setTrajectory(Trajectory trajectory) {
096    m_poses.clear();
097    for (Trajectory.State state : trajectory.getStates()) {
098      m_poses.add(state.poseMeters);
099    }
100    updateEntry();
101  }
102
103  /**
104   * Get multiple poses.
105   *
106   * @return list of 2D poses
107   */
108  public synchronized List<Pose2d> getPoses() {
109    updateFromEntry();
110    return new ArrayList<Pose2d>(m_poses);
111  }
112
113  void updateEntry() {
114    updateEntry(false);
115  }
116
117  synchronized void updateEntry(boolean setDefault) {
118    if (m_entry == null) {
119      return;
120    }
121
122    double[] arr = new double[m_poses.size() * 3];
123    int ndx = 0;
124    for (Pose2d pose : m_poses) {
125      Translation2d translation = pose.getTranslation();
126      arr[ndx + 0] = translation.getX();
127      arr[ndx + 1] = translation.getY();
128      arr[ndx + 2] = pose.getRotation().getDegrees();
129      ndx += 3;
130    }
131
132    if (setDefault) {
133      m_entry.setDefault(arr);
134    } else {
135      m_entry.set(arr);
136    }
137  }
138
139  private synchronized void updateFromEntry() {
140    if (m_entry == null) {
141      return;
142    }
143
144    double[] arr = m_entry.get((double[]) null);
145    if (arr != null) {
146      if ((arr.length % 3) != 0) {
147        return;
148      }
149
150      m_poses.clear();
151      for (int i = 0; i < arr.length; i += 3) {
152        m_poses.add(new Pose2d(arr[i], arr[i + 1], Rotation2d.fromDegrees(arr[i + 2])));
153      }
154    }
155  }
156
157  String m_name;
158  DoubleArrayEntry m_entry;
159  private final List<Pose2d> m_poses = new ArrayList<>();
160}
